items.title: Favorites Collection
items.description: Save your favorite images for quick access! Click the heart button or use Cmd+F to add images to your personal favorites collection. Access all your favorites through the dedicated Favorites view.

items.title: Heart Indicators
items.description: Visual heart indicators on thumbnails show which images are in your favorites collection at a glance.

items.title: Favorites Navigation
items.description: Browse your favorites collection with full keyboard navigation support using arrow keys, Enter for full-screen, and Delete to remove favorites.

items.title: What's New Feature
items.description: Stay informed about new features and improvements with automatic update notifications and on-demand access through the Help menu.

items.title: Enhanced Thumbnail Grid
items.description: Improved performance and visual quality for browsing large image collections.

items.title: Responsive Layout System
items.description: Dynamic grid layouts that adapt to window size and content for optimal viewing experience.

items.title: Enhanced Accessibility Support
items.description: Comprehensive accessibility improvements including screen reader support for favorites, high contrast mode compatibility, and detailed accessibility hints for all interactive elements.

items.title: Persistent Favorites Storage
items.description: Your favorites are automatically saved and persist between app sessions. The app also validates favorites on startup to ensure all saved images are still accessible.

items.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
items.description: New keyboard shortcuts for favorites management: Cmd+F to toggle favorites, Delete key to remove from favorites, and arrow keys for navigation in favorites view.

items.title: Faster Image Loading
items.description: Optimized image loading pipeline reduces wait times and improves responsiveness.

items.title: Better Memory Management
items.description: Enhanced memory handling prevents crashes when viewing large image collections.

items.title: Dark Mode Enhancements
items.description: Refined dark mode appearance with better contrast and visual hierarchy, including adaptive colors for heart indicators.

items.title: Favorites File Validation
items.description: Improved handling of moved or deleted images in favorites collection with automatic cleanup of invalid entries.

items.title: Heart Indicator Animations
items.description: Fixed heart indicator animations to respect reduced motion accessibility preferences.

items.title: Fixed Thumbnail Generation
items.description: Resolved issues with thumbnail generation for certain image formats.

items.title: Window State Persistence
items.description: Fixed window size and position not being remembered between app launches.

items.title: Keyboard Navigation
items.description: Corrected keyboard shortcuts not working in certain UI states and improved accessibility announcements.
